hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I craft exceptional digital experiences through clean code and innovative solutions

about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I specialize in building scalable applications with focus on user experience and performance.
about.name: Your Name
about.bio: I'm a passionate developer who loves creating innovative solutions. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

hobbies.title: Hobbies & Interests
hobbies.subtitle: What I love doing in my free time

items.name: Music Production
items.description: Creating beats and experimenting with different genres in my home studio.

items.name: Photography
items.description: Capturing moments and exploring the world through my lens, especially nature and urban landscapes.

items.name: Gaming
items.description: Enjoying strategy games and indie titles. Love analyzing game mechanics and design patterns.

items.name: Fitness
items.description: Staying active with weightlifting and running. A healthy body keeps the mind sharp for coding.

items.name: Reading
items.description: Tech books, sci-fi novels, and design philosophy. Always learning something new.

items.name: Coffee Culture
items.description: Exploring local coffee shops and perfecting my pour-over technique. Great coffee fuels great code.

items.name: Travel
items.description: Exploring new places, cultures, and tech scenes around the world. Travel broadens perspective.

items.name: Design
items.description: UI/UX design, digital art, and creative projects. Love bringing ideas to life visually.

items.name: Side Projects
items.description: Building personal projects, contributing to open source, and experimenting with new tech stacks.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects I contributed to as part of development teams
projects.note: Note: This is a selection of public projects. Additional projects are currently under NDA or in development.

project1.title: BASF Virtual Car
project1.description: Interactive 3D car configurator platform allowing users to explore materials and components. Developed CMS integrations, API connections, and synchronization scripts for the offline version.
project1.contribution: CMS setup & integrations, API connections, synchronization scripts, offline version integration
project1.tech: Vue.js, Three.js, Node.js, CMS, REST APIs, WebGL

project2.title: BASF Virtual Car - Offline
project2.description: Offline version of the Virtual Car platform with local data synchronization and PWA capabilities for seamless user experience without internet connection.
project2.contribution: Offline functionality, data synchronization, PWA implementation
project2.tech: Vue.js, PWA, IndexedDB, Service Workers, Sync API

project3.title: UP Design Studio
project3.description: Modern design studio portfolio website showcasing multidisciplinary design work. Implemented new features, bug fixes, and optimized server configuration.
project3.contribution: Feature development, bug fixes, Nginx configuration, performance optimization
project3.tech: Next.js, React, Nginx, Headless CMS, TypeScript

project4.title: SMINA - Online Sanitätshaus
project4.description: E-commerce platform for medical aids and mobility products. Full-featured online shop with product catalog, prescription upload, and partner network integration.
project4.contribution: Frontend development, feature implementation, API integrations
project4.tech: React, Node.js, E-commerce, Payment Integration, CMS

project5.title: Khimi - Auxilium Gruppe
project5.description: Corporate platform with CMS integration and custom features. Set up content management system and configured server infrastructure.
project5.contribution: CMS setup, backend development, Nginx configuration, feature implementation
project5.tech: CMS, Nginx, Backend APIs, Server Configuration

project6.title: Dürr Interactive Showroom
project6.description: Interactive showroom platform showcasing industrial solutions. Implemented Strapi CMS backend and configured server infrastructure for multiple interactive applications.
project6.contribution: Strapi CMS setup, Nginx configuration, backend development
project6.tech: Strapi CMS, Node.js, Nginx, Interactive 3D, WebGL

project7.title: Multi-Tenant Sanitätshaus Platform
project7.description: Scalable multi-tenant platform serving multiple medical supply companies. Each tenant has customized branding and features while sharing core infrastructure.
project7.contribution: Multi-tenant architecture, Nginx configuration, tracking integration, feature development
project7.tech: Multi-Tenant Architecture, Nginx, Tracking Integration, CMS, React

project8.title: Additional Projects
project8.description: Several additional projects are currently under development or covered by non-disclosure agreements. These include enterprise applications, internal tools, and client-specific solutions.
project8.contribution: Various contributions across frontend, backend, and infrastructure

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.
